snippet: The denial of the governor’s latest appeal dashed what was widely regarded as his last hope to shorten his sentence for corruption.
abstract: Federal appeals court in Chicago denies former Illinois Gov George H Ryan’s latest appeal seeking his release from prison, dashing what is widely regarded as his last hope to shorten his sentence for bribery and corruption.
lead_paragraph: The denial of the governor’s latest appeal dashed what was widely regarded as his last hope to shorten his sentence for corruption.

headline.main: Illinois: Former Gov. George Ryan Is Denied Early Release From Prison
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Former Gov. George Ryan Is Denied Early Release From Prison
